alert.note: Alert for Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:56AM EST until February 24 at 10:35AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following counties, Fulton and Herkimer. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1156 AM EST, emergency management reported an ice jam near the warned area due to Ice Jam. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dolgeville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
